name: simple-pogo-image-collection-maker
description: Create a collection of pogo images for trading or whatever else

scripts.deploy:setup: echo 'Setting up Firebase environment variables...' && firebase login && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY="$FIREBASE_API_KEY" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN="$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_DATABASE_URL="$FIREBASE_DATABASE_URL" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID="$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET="$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID="$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID="$FIREBASE_APP_ID" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID="$FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID" && firebase hosting:config:set env.VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_URL="$FIREBASE_STORAGE_URL"
scripts.deploy: npm run version:bump && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
